questions.question:
What are the best ways for gaining attention and arousing motivation of the student?
  1. Using voice modulation and eye contact
  2. Keeping a strict discipline expression on the face
  3. Introducing an activity or a demonstration
  4. Narrating a story or doing role play
  5. Distributing pictures and asking students to study on their own

Which of the following are among the steps for structuring the set induction?
  1. The session starts with stating the purpose and not telling the title to be taught.
  2. The teacher writes the title on the board at the start of session.
  3. The teachers asks a series of questions in logical sequence during set induction by questioning.
  4. The main objective of set induction is to draw the title from the students using previous knowledge.
  5. Teacher can exceed the given time limit of 3.7 minutes.
